original_text: I have not done anything that is wrong. But it does not matter what happens to me. My life is not important to me. I have not done anything that is wrong.
korean_text: 나는 온전하다마는 내가 나를 돌아보지 아니하고 내 생명을 천히 여기는구나

sentences.original_text: I have not done anything that is wrong.
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 잘못된 것을 한 적이 없습니다.

sentences.original_text: But it does not matter what happens to me.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 내게 무슨 일이 일어나는지는 중요하지 않습니다.

sentences.original_text: My life is not important to me.
I have not done anything that is wrong.
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 잘못된 것을 한 적이 없습니다.
